name: Sneak Out (IrishGingy)
description:
You are excited to see your friend, and have an all night game session. However, your parents won't allow them over to your house that late at night, and your friend is not able to leave his sister alone to go to your house. You decide to wake up at 1:00 am after your parents are asleep, sneak out and over to your friends house, and be back home before anyone is the wiser.

Controls:

WASD - Moves your player

Spacebar - Jump

All assets, music, and sound effects were made by the Ginger-Lee Team!

Thank you and ENJOY!
